title: The Backwardation Edition
description:
This week, Slate Money discusses the question of land redistribution in South Africa, the future of real estate broker fees and goes deep on the economics of oil.
And in the Slate Plus segment: The Koons Rabbit that just sold for $91 million. 
Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas,@EmilyRPeck, 
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli.
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
